learnMore.title: ‚ÑπÔ∏è About Iskra
learnMore.body:
Iskra is a dating bot that helps you find meaningful connections.

‚Ä¢ Create a profile with photos and bio
‚Ä¢ Set your preferences and filters
‚Ä¢ Browse profiles and send likes
‚Ä¢ Match with people who like you back
‚Ä¢ Start conversations securely

Your privacy matters. We never share your data.
